_description: The bloody shirt, an allegory of the crucified Christ — three couplets in the Gesta Romanorum, also found in Dives and Pauper

BLAdd9066.Transcription:
While I haue in myndethe blode of hym that was so kyndeand kyng
                    how shuld I hym forsakethat the dethe for me wolde takenay for sothe I
                    shall not sofor he brought me from mekill woo
